effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 668,471 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 276,310.
(4) Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,271, further increased by 859 while you remain within its light.

Use: Gain 4 stacks of Platinum Plating for 30 sec, increasing your Armor by 10,131. Receiving more than 10% of your health from a Physical damage effect will remove one stack of Platinum Plating. (2 Min Cooldown)

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
